#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define fast cin.sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(0)
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define ff first
#define ss second
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define INF (((ll)1000000000) * ((ll)1000000000))
#define N 100005
#define ll long long
#define MOD 1000000007
#define gcd __gcd
#define fill(A,v) memset(A,v,sizeof(A))
#define all(x) (x).begin(), (x).end()
int dp[2][505];
int main()
{
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	int cur,prev,i,j,val,m,l,ans=0,q;
	cin>>q;
	while(q--)
	{
		cin>>m>>l;
		ans=0;
		cur=0,prev=1;
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		  dp[0][i]=dp[1][i]=0;
		for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
		{
			val=s[i]-48;
			for(j=0;j<m;j++)
			{
				dp[cur][j]=0;
			}
			for(j=0;j<m;j++)
			{
				if(dp[prev][j]!=0)
				{
					dp[cur][(10*j+val)%m]+=dp[prev][j];
				}
			}
			dp[cur][val%m]++;
			ans+=dp[cur][l];
			cur=1-cur;
			prev=1-prev;
		}
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
